item.title: FAQ
item.description: This page is intended to provide answers to some questions that frequently appear in the community. Why is CodiMD now called HedgeDoc?

item.title: History
item.description: HedgeDoc is the community-driven fork of CodiMD, which is the open source pendant to HackMD. Confused? Let us explain: image/svg+xml May '15First commit in thehistory of HackMD July '15Start of hackmd.
